notes:
used IRGA to measure root respiration with a manually sealed soil respiration chamber. Methods similar to those in this paper: 

Abramoff, R. Z., & Finzi, A. C. (2016). Seasonality and partitioning of Root allocation to rhizosphere soils in a midlatitude forest. Ecosphere, 7(11). https://doi.org/10.1002/ecs2.1547
